{"id":501808093,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 months, 1 week","timestamp":1622625937,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/501808093/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"23.3 MB","code":"#pragma GCC optimize(\"Ofast\")\n#pragma GCC target(\"avx,avx2,fma\")\nstatic auto _ = []() {\n  ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);\n  cin.tie(nullptr);\n  cout.tie(nullptr);\n  return 0;\n}();\n\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int vis[51][51]={0};\n\n    int dfs(vector<vector<int>>& grid,int i,int j)\n    {\n      if(i>=grid.size() || j>=grid[i].size() || i<0 || j<0 || vis[i][j]==1 || grid[i][j]==0)\n        return 0;\n      vis[i][j]=1;      \n      return (1+dfs(grid,i+1,j)+dfs(grid,i,j+1)+dfs(grid,i-1,j)+dfs(grid,i,j-1));\n    }\n\n    int maxAreaOfIsland(vector<vector<int>>& grid) {\n        int maxi=0;\n        for(int i=0;i<grid.size();i++)\n        {\n          for(int j=0;j<grid[i].size();j++)\n          {\n            if(vis[i][j]==0 && grid[i][j]==1)\n              maxi=max(maxi,dfs(grid,i,j));\n            vis[i][j]=1;           \n          }\n        }\n        return maxi;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island"}
